concept.title: File Tail
concept.shortdesc: The File Tail origin reads data as it is written to an active file after reading related archived files in the same directory. If the active file is archived, File Tail continues to the new active file, reading all existing data in the file and tailing incoming data.

conbody.p: File Tail originovervieworiginsFile TailYou can use File Tail to read active files and related archived files in multiple directories.

When the pipeline stops, File Tail notes where it stopped reading. When the pipeline starts again, by default, File Tail continues processing from where it left off. You can reset the origin to process all available archived files before continuing to the active file.
